verses.text: Again there was a day when the sons of God came to present themselves before the Lord, and Satan came also among them to present himself before the Lord.

similars.text: And Satan came among them, saying: I am also a son of God; and he commanded them, saying: Believe it not; and they believed it not, and they loved Satan more than God. And men began from that time forth to be carnal, sensual, and devilish.
For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God.
But as the days of Noe were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.

Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
